00023 template <typename Attribute>
00024 class TAttributeMemberBase
00025 {
00026 public:
00027        typedef Attribute AttributeType;
00028        typedef void InterfaceType;
00029 
00030        TAttributeMemberBase();
00031 
00039        bool Init(    const IComponent* ownerPtr,
00040                             const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00041                             const IComponent** definitionComponentPtr = NULL);
00042 
00046        bool IsValid() const;

00073 template <typename Attribute>
00074 TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::TAttributeMemberBase()
00075 :      m_attributePtr(NULL)
00076 {
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 template <typename Attribute>
00081 bool TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::Init(
00082                      const IComponent* ownerPtr,
00083                      const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00084                      const IComponent** definitionComponentPtr)
00085 {
00086        I_ASSERT(ownerPtr != NULL);
00087 
00088        const QByteArray& attributeId = staticInfo.GetAttributeId();
00089        const IComponentContext* componentContextPtr = ownerPtr->GetComponentContext();
00090        if (componentContextPtr != NULL){
00091               int definitionLevel = -1;
00092               const iser::IObject* attributePtr = componentContextPtr->GetAttribute(attributeId, &definitionLevel);
00093               m_attributePtr = dynamic_cast<const Attribute*>(attributePtr);
00094 
00095               if (m_attributePtr != NULL){
00096                      I_ASSERT(definitionLevel >= 0);
00097 
00098                      if (definitionComponentPtr != NULL){
00099                             while (definitionLevel > 0){
00100                                    ownerPtr = ownerPtr->GetParentComponent();
00101                                    I_ASSERT(ownerPtr != NULL);
00102 
00103                                    --definitionLevel;
00104                             }
00105 
00106                             *definitionComponentPtr = ownerPtr;
00107                      }
00108 
00109                      return true;
00110               }
00111        }
00112        else{
00113               m_attributePtr = NULL;
00114        }
00115 
00116        return false;
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 template <typename Attribute>
00121 bool TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::IsValid() const
00122 {
00123        return (m_attributePtr != NULL);
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 template <typename Attribute>
00128 const Attribute* TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::GetAttributePtr() const
00129 {
00130        return m_attributePtr;
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 template <typename Attribute>
00135 const Attribute* TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::operator->() const
00136 {
00137        return m_attributePtr;
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00141 template <typename Attribute>
00142 typename const Attribute::ValueType& TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::operator*() const
00143 {
00144        I_ASSERT(m_attributePtr != NULL);  // operator* was called for invalid object, or no IsValid() check was called.
00145 
00146        return m_attributePtr->GetValue();
00147 }
00148

00152 template <typename Attribute>
00153 void TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::SetAttribute(const Attribute* attributePtr)
00154 {
00155        m_attributePtr = attributePtr;
00156 }

00159 // other constructs used for special template for QString attribute
00160 
00161 template <typename Attribute>
00162 class TAttributeMember: public TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>
00163 {
00164 };
00165 
00166 
00167 template <>
00168 class TAttributeMember< TAttribute<QString> >: public TAttributeMemberBase< TAttribute<QString> >
00169 {
00170 public:
00171        QString operator*() const
00172        {
00173               return QCoreApplication::translate("Attribute", TAttributeMemberBase< TAttribute<QString> >::operator*().toAscii());
00174        }
00175 };
